attributes.action: Abolish House of Lords if they block the EU (Notification of Withdrawal) Bill
attributes.background: The House of Commons democratically elected MP's voted on the EU  Bill 494 to 122, with a Large majority of 372, to invoke Article 50 in compliance, with a majority vote in the EU Referendum 23/06/2016 to leave the EU. The unelected Peers should not block/frustrate the will of the people.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178288
